name: proyecto-stw-back
description: Repositorio para el backend del proyecto -  Aplicaci√≥n sobre recetas de cocina

dependencies-summary.axios: Promise-based HTTP client for making HTTP requests
dependencies-summary.compression: Middleware to compress response bodies for all requests
dependencies-summary.cors: Middleware to enable Cross-Origin Resource Sharing
dependencies-summary.dotenv: Loads environment variables from a .env file
dependencies-summary.helmet: Middleware to secure Express apps by setting various HTTP headers
dependencies-summary.json2csv: Library to convert JSON to CSV format
dependencies-summary.jsonwebtoken: Library to create and verify JSON Web Tokens
dependencies-summary.mongoose: MongoDB object modeling tool designed to work in an asynchronous environment
dependencies-summary.nodemailer: Library to send emails from Node.js
dependencies-summary.nodemon: Utility that monitors for any changes in your source and automatically restarts your server
dependencies-summary.passport-github2: Passport strategy for authenticating with GitHub
dependencies-summary.passport-google-oauth20: Passport strategy for authenticating with Google using OAuth 2.0
dependencies-summary.passport-jwt: Passport strategy for authenticating with JSON Web Tokens
dependencies-summary.passport-local: Passport strategy for authenticating with a username and password
dependencies-summary.swagger-jsdoc: Generates swagger spec from JSDoc comments
dependencies-summary.swagger-ui-express: Middleware to serve auto-generated swagger-ui generated API docs
dependencies-summary.winston-daily-rotate-file: Transport for winston that logs to a rotating file each day
